incident_updates.body: Start time : 03/03/2022 01:00 UTC End time : 03/03/2022 04:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : We need to standardize the configuration of the ERI Core.

Start time : 03/03/2022 05:00 UTC End time : 03/03/2022 14:00 UTC Service impact : The servers will be unreachable during the operations (30 minutes per server) Service improvement : Move the server to another location.

Start time : 03/03/2022 05:00 UTC End time : 03/03/2022 08:00 UTC Service impact : Some servers will face a downtime of 1 hour and 30 minutes Service improvement : To improve the performance of our cooling system, we are replacing PVC pipes with copper ones.
Start time : 03/03/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 03/03/2022 18:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Water manifold replacement
Start time : 03/03/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 03/03/2022 16:00 UTC Service impact : 1 minute shutdown of battery charging Service improvement : Test UPS batteries

Service impact : As we announced, we are closing SBG4 datacenter. We will reboot all the servers (located in SBG4 ==> racks 90Axx, 90Bxx, 90Cxx and 90Dxx) in rescue-pro or WinPE mode depending on your OS. A communication has been sent to you if your services are impacted. We thank you for your understanding
